message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value for you, estimated at $15000. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $12000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a discounted rate, tailored to provide exceptional benefits and satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
